Articles.Content:
Micrometeorites was one of my favorite mods. Sadly it doesn't work in .23.

The meteorites dont show and the bumps on the ship gets crazy.

I sent a PM to the developer but I haven't had a response. I suppose that its abandoned.

I edited this mod before to reduce the frequency of the micrometeorites.

And I try to fix it by building it with .23 files but it doesn`t work.

I'm new to programing and I dont know how to change this mod to make it work.

I hope somebody lend me a hand.

I want to:

Get rid of the physical bump (I want a purely aesthetic mod).

Change the frecuency based on the size of the ship.

And above all make it work.

Thanks for your help

Sorry for my english.
